title: Getting Started with HTML
author: ZeeTech
preview: Here u learn what html means. HTML stands for Hypertext Markup Language.
content: HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language. It is the standard language used to create web pages. With HTML, you can structure your content using tags like headings, paragraphs, images, links and much more. It forms the basic skeleton of any web development project and is often used alongside CSS and JavaScript to build interactive, styled web apps.

title: CSS for Beginners
author: ZeeTech
preview: Here u learn what html means. HTML stands for Hypertext Markup Language.
content: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets. It is used to control the layout and appearance of HTML elements. With CSS, you can change colors, fonts, spacing, alignment, and more. It helps in making your website responsive, attractive, and consistent across different devices.
